review: So I bought the Stick when the first $20 deal came out, gave it to my mother for Christmas and she loved it.  She's tech leery, but had no issues using it right away.  After seeing it in action for a few weeks, I decided I needed to get one of myself as well.  My main reason was because I was having issues watching the WWE network on my Xbox 360.  The Fire Stick is running the WWE Network in a higher resolution than either my PC or Xbox, and much smoother play rate as well.Also, works great with my Nyko Playpad, even had instructions displaying for it at the pairing screen.  I think they knew that before the fire game pad was released, the Nyko was the most common Bluetooth used on the tablets.
